div.p: 2nd Annual China PHP Conference – August 2 to 3, Shanghai!

ThinkInLAMP will be hosting a 2-days event filled with high quality, technical sessions about PHP Core, PHP High Performance, PHP Engineering, and PHP more. During this session you will hear from Laruence Hui and his <PHP New Generation is coming!> and an exclusive Q&A with him.

Don’t miss out on 2-great days sessions, delicious food, fantastic shows and countless networking opportunities to engage with speakers and delegates. For tickets and more information: www.phpconchina.com
